title: Sampler, 19th century
medium:
Medium: wool and straw embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, half cross, satin, roumanian, back, rococo, fishbone, knot, and running stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Eighty patterns arranged on a narrow width.  One pattern is in raised work.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: wool and straw embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, half cross, satin, roumanian, back, rococo, fishbone, knot, and running stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-325.
